subject: Mixed Martial Arts
Cable Television
lead_paragraph: The parent company of the UFC, long the dominant force in mixed martial arts, has purchased the rival promoter Strikeforce, although Strikeforce will continue to operate as a separate entity.
snippet: The parent company of the UFC, long the dominant force in mixed martial arts, has purchased the rival promoter Strikeforce, although Strikeforce will continue to operate as a separate entity.
